participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Friendly and hardworking, enjoys nature and the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: I've zero family that I'm close to. My favorite food is papaya. I am a bee farmer.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Curious and analytical, with a passion for learning and exploring new ideas.
participant_2.background: I read a book every week. I started a new job as a PA three months ago. I live with my husband in Pennsylvania. My favorite kind of movie is a documentary.
